s0199: Zhou Xiang Wang sent chief steward Kong granted Huan Gong Wen Wu blessing meat, red bow arrows, great carriage, ordered no bow.
s0200: Huan Gong wished permit it, Guan Zhong said 'cannot', then descended bowed received grant.
s0201: Autumn, again assembled feudal lords at Kui Qiu, increasingly had arrogant color.
s0202: Zhou sent chief steward Kong assembled.
s0204: Jin Hou ill, after, met chief steward Kong.
s0205: Chief steward Kong said: 'Qi Hou arrogant, brother do not go.'
s0207: This year, Jin Xian Gong died, Li Ke killed Xi Qi, Zhuo Zi, Qin Mu Gong with wife entered Gong Zi Yi Wu as Jin lord.
s0208: Huan Gong then punished Jin disorder, reached Gao Liang, made Xi Peng establish Jin lord, returned.
s0209: At this time Zhou chamber slight, only Qi, Chu, Qin, Jin strong.
s0210: Jin initially with assembled, Xian Gong died, country internal chaos.
s0211: Qin Mu Gong avoided far, not with central states assembled allied.
s0212: Chu Cheng Wang initially collected Jing Man had it, Yi Di self established.
s0213: Only alone Qi for central states assembled allied, Huan Gong able proclaimed his virtue, so feudal lords guest assembled.
s0214: Then Huan Gong declared: 'I south attacked to Zhao Ling, gazed Xiong Shan;
s0215: north attacked Shan Rong, Li Zhi, Gu Zhu;
s0216: west attacked Da Xia, crossed Liu Sha;
s0217: tied horses hung carriages ascended Tai Hang, reached Bei Er Shan returned.
s0219: I war chariots assembled three, riding carriages assembled six, nine united feudal lords, one corrected world.
s0220: Former three dynasties received mandate, what different from this?
s0221: I wish feng Tai Shan, shan Liang Fu.'
s0222: Guan Zhong firmly advised, not listen;
s0223: then persuaded Huan Gong with distant precious strange monsters arrive then able feng, Huan Gong then stopped.
s0224: Thirty-eighth year, Zhou Xiang Wang younger brother Dai with Rong, Di united plotted attacked Zhou, Qi made Guan Zhong pacify Rong at Zhou.
s0225: Zhou wished with upper minister rites Guan Zhong, Guan Zhong knocked head said: 'Minister attendant minister, dare!'
s0226: Three declined, then received lower minister rites to see.
s0227: Thirty-ninth year, Zhou Xiang Wang younger brother Dai came flee Qi.
s0228: Qi sent Zhong Sun requested Wang, apologized for Dai.
s0230: Forty-first year, Qin Mu Gong captured Jin Hui Gong, again returned him.
s0231: This year, Guan Zhong, Xi Peng all died.
s0232: Guan Zhong ill, Huan Gong asked: 'Group ministers who can chancellor?'
s0233: Guan Zhong said: 'Know minister none like lord.'
s0235: Answered: 'Kill son to please lord, not human feeling, cannot.'
s0237: Answered: 'Doubled parents to please lord, not human feeling, difficult approach.'
s0239: Answered: 'Self castrated to please lord, not human feeling, difficult close.'
s0240: Guan Zhong died, Huan Gong not used Guan Zhong words, finally approached used three sons, three sons monopolized power.
s0241: Forty-second year, Rong attacked Zhou, Zhou urgently told Qi, Qi ordered feudal lords each send troops garrison Zhou.
s0242: This year, Jin gong zi Chong Er came, Huan Gong married him.
s0244: Initially, Qi Huan Gong's wife three: called Wang Ji, Xu Ji, Cai Ji, all no sons.
s0245: Huan Gong liked inner chambers, many inner favorites, like wives six people, eldest Wei Ji, gave birth Wu Wei;
s0246: young Wei Ji, gave birth Hui Gong Yuan;
s0247: Zheng Ji, gave birth Xiao Gong Zhao;
s0252: 桓公病，五公子各樹黨爭立。
s0253: 及桓公卒，遂相攻，以故宮中空，莫敢棺。
s0254: 桓公尸在牀上六十七日，尸蟲出于戶。
s0256: 桓公十有餘子，要其後立者五人：無諡、前死；次孝公、昭公、懿公、惠公。
s0257: 孝公元年三月，宋華子立為宋君，仲父戎出奔陳。
s0262: 十年，孝公卒，弟潘因衛公子開方殺孝公子而立潘，是為昭公。
s0263: 昭公，桓公子也，其母曰葛嬴。
s0264: 昭公元年，衞公子開方棄其妻子奔齊。
s0266: 魯請盟，齊素信子，將許魯。
s0267: 鮑子諫曰：「齊信其信可也，不可素也。
s0270: 三年，宋文公卒，齊伐宋，取淮北之地。
s0271: 四年，齊伐魯，伐至嬴，圍昌宰。
s0272: 六年，衛伐齊，齊伐衛反之。
s0273: 十年，昭公卒，子舍立為齊君。
s0274: 舍之母無寵於昭公，國人莫畏。
s0275: 昭公之弟商人以術數篡舍而自立，是為懿公。
s0276: 懿公，桓公子也，其母曰密姬。
s0278: 懿公四年，晉文公伐齊，至于陽穀。
s0281: 五年，魯使公子遂如齊，以術數取賂賂齊，遂亦賂齊，使公子遂去賂。
s0282: 六年，春，齊伐魯，取郓而居昭公夫人。
s0283: 及晏子之諫，一歲中往來問焉。
s0285: 十年，齊太子商人之母婖，與太子異母弟姜歌、公子山相怨。
s0287: 二人弒懿公，商人自立，是為惠公。
s0288: 惠公，桓公子也，其母曰宋華子。
s0291: 五年，齊伐魯，魯使公子遂如齊謝罪。
s0294: 八年，齊伐魯，魯使公子遂如齊請罪。
s0295: 九年，晉臼季使，而齊使公子遂如晉。
s0297: 十一年，齊使公子遂如晉。
s0298: 十二年，齊使公子遂如晉，請伐魯。
s0301: 十六年，齊伐魯，季孫斯、叔孫州仇、仲孫何忌救之。
s0302: 不敗，鮑子曰：「吾，君之所知也，敦與季孫之知叔孫孰賢？」
s0305: 以季孫之賢聖，而季孫之智不如叔孫，以其篡也。
s0307: 十七年，齊侯使公子遂如晉，鮑子鮑子醉而往，鮑子曰：「臣侍君宴，過三爵，非禮也。
s0308: 臣聞之曰，無禮而討不祥。」
s0309: 使公子遂去曰：「歸而君與鮑子謀之。」
s0311: 十九年，齊伐魯，季孫斯、叔孫州仇、仲孫何忌救之。
s0312: 二十年，齊烏餘以廩丘奔晉。
s0314: 二十二年，齊伐魯，季孫斯、叔孫州仇、仲孫何忌救之。
s0317: 二十五年，齊伐魯，南鄙及費。
s0319: 二十七年，齊伐魯，敗之，取成。
s0320: 二十八年，齊伐魯，攻廩丘。
s0321: 二十九年，齊伐魯，入陽關。
s0325: 三十三年，齊伐魯，入卞，取郓。
s0326: 三十四年，齊伐魯，入郕，取東鄙。
s0327: 三十五年，齊伐魯，敗之，取卞。
s0338: 四十六年，齊伐魯，取東鄙。
s0403: 一百十一年，齊伐魯，取卞。
